details.additional_details: Provisional results of the written examination (CBRE) held from 07.12.2024 to 18.12.2024 for the post of Sepoys/ Constables in OSAP / IR / SS Battalions are hereby published.

name: Final Answer Keys of Computer Based Recruitment Examination (CBRE) for the post of Driver in PMT Establishment

details.Issued By: Amitabh Thakur, IPS, ADGP, Transport Commissioner -cum- Chairman, Recruitment of Drivers in P,M,T Odisha, Cuttack,
